sentences.english: The trophy is named after Giuseppe Garibaldi, an Italian revolutionary born in Nizza (now Nice) in 1807.

sentences.english: A few minutes later we turned onto a lane parallel to Garibaldi .

sentences.english: The Klement house on Garibaldi Street was marked with a black X;
